item.title: Fitting Bayesian Models using Stan and R
item.description: What’s Stan and Why Use It? How does Stan work? A Note on Divergences Filling your Stan Toolbox A Note on Priors Example Model: Predicting Salmon Write Your Statistical Model Examine spawning and recruitment data Write Your Stan Model Transformed Parameters Block Fitting your model Run Diagnostics Assessing and Fixing Divergences and Treedepth Problems Feature Engineering and Non-Centering Parameter Diagnostics Posterior Predictive Analysis Comparing Models rstanarm References What’s Stan and Why Use It?

item.title: Data Wrangling and Model Fitting using purrr
item.description: What is purrr? The Basics of purrr Key purrr verbs Multiple lists using pmap Wrangling lists Analysis with purrr and modelr Parallel purrr Miscellaneos purrr Debugging using safely Find and Convert Factors Print All Plots to PDF Partial These are materials from a workshop I taught for UC Santa Barbara’s eco-data-science group to get people familiar with using purrr for their data-wrangling and modeling needs.
